text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0121 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
E Report exceptions onlyReport exceptions only
R Same as E, also Replacement and Parent-ChildReport exceptions, replacement and parent-child
D Same as R, also other associated segmentsReport exceptions, replacement, parent-child and other associated segments
F Same as D, plus confirmations explicitlyReport exceptions, replacement, parent-child, other associated segments and explicit confirmations
N Only the MSA segment is returnedOnly the MSA segment is returned

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
ENur OK oder Fehlercode nach Auftragsprüfung / -bearbeitung
RWie E, zusätzlich ORC-Segmente von nachgeordneten und Ersatzaufträgen
DWie R, zusätzlich Detail-Segmente (OBR usw.) von nachgeordneten und Ersatzaufträ
FWie D, zusätzlich ausdrückliche Bestätigungen
NNur Eingangsbestätigung

name: ResponseFlag
title: responseFlag
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts allowing the placer (sending) application to determine the amount of information to be returned from the filler.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the ORC segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0121 (Response Flag)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

designation.value: Nur OK oder Fehlercode nach Auftragsprüfung / -bearbeitung

concept.display: Same as E, also Replacement and Parent-Child

designation.value: Wie E, zusätzlich ORC-Segmente von nachgeordneten und Ersatzaufträgen

concept.display: Same as R, also other associated segments
concept.definition: Report exceptions, replacement, parent-child and other associated segments

designation.value: Wie R, zusätzlich Detail-Segmente (OBR usw.) von nachgeordneten und Ersatzaufträ

concept.display: Same as D, plus confirmations explicitly
concept.definition: Report exceptions, replacement, parent-child, other associated segments and explicit confirmations

concept.display: Only the MSA segment is returned
concept.definition: Only the MSA segment is returned
